name: Cursed Swamp
description:
In Cursed swamp you play as a water spirit that has been trapped by monsters in a magical swamp. You must collect glass shards to rebuild a strained class window to break the curse and free yourself.

Product of the GMTK game jam 2021

Use the WASD keys to move around and collect the glass shards to add panes to the stained glass window. Avoid the swamp monsters and the chains that bind them.

Development Team:

  • Emily Waugh: Project Management, Mechanic, Level, and VFX Design
  • David Helbling: Coder 
  • Jared Burkamper: Coder

Art Team:

  • Emily Wynkoop: Character Design and Environment
  • Dustin Downs: Environment
